question[answers][0][answer_text]: The nature of the problem determines how outliers are used.
question[answers][1][answer_text]: Outliers should be identified and removed from a dataset.
question[answers][2][answer_text]: Outliers should be part of the training dataset but should not be present in the test data.
question[answers][3][answer_text]: Outliers should be part of the test dataset but should not be present in the training data.
